doc.title: Akazukin Chacha
doc.plot: Akazukin Chacha, or Red Hood Chacha, by Ayahana Min, is loosely (extremely loosely) based on Little Red Riding Hood. The main characters are: Chacha, a little red-hooded girl who is an incompetent magic user; Riiya, a werewolf boy and Chacha's best friend; and Shiine, a magic-using boy who wants Chacha. The stories revolve around the adventures of the three characters and, on a lesser scale, their love triangle. Chacha can also transform into a magical fighting girl for some reason...
